Preview1   Use Case for  Tercel Service Designer and End User
1. Fetch the WF
2. Create a Action

7. Create a Service_Group

9. Create a Category 
10. Get Images 
11. Create a CatalogItem
12. Create a CatalogItemAction
13. Publish CatalogItem
14. Place a Order 
15. Get the Order Details 
16. Delete the CatalogItemAction, CatalogItem , Category , Service , Form and Action
